author: Digital Foundry
description:
Thanks to MSI for sponsoring this content. Learn more about MSI's Black Friday discounts here: https://msi.gm/S86F5A69

A new patch has "dropped" for Metal Gear Solid Delta and there are big performance and feature improvements in some areas, but is the game actually fixed? Meanwhile, Oliver gets to grips with Vampire: The Masquerade Bloodlines 2 and comes away disappointed, while John is highly impressed with Lumines Arise. The team try to work their way through a puzzling interview from Microsoft's Satya Nadella, while a promising game that first started development in 2012 now actually has a launch trailer - but what is Routine? And 13 years on, why should you be interested?

Go here to check out DF merch! https://store.digitalfoundry.net

0:00:00 Introduction
0:02:27 News 1: Metal Gear Solid Delta patch shows performance bump
0:23:57 News 2: Bloodlines 2 tested on PS5
0:33:54 News 3: Assassin’s Creed Shadows trailer dr
title: DF Direct Weekly #238: MGS Delta Fixed? Vampire: The Masquerade Bloodlines 2, AC Shadows Switch 2!
